author: Special Correspondent
text:
A couple died in a road accident on the Tiruchi – Thanjavur national highway near Thuvakudi on the city’s outskirts on Sunday.

The fatal accident occurred near the Rowthanmedu diversion when C. Durairaj (50) and his wife D. Dhanalakshmi (47) were going on a moped after visiting their relative’s house at Eechangadu area on the city’s outskirts.

The couple resided in Vadakku Kattur.

Police sources said a vehicle rammed the moped from behind causing the death of the couple on the spot.

The bodies were sent to Government Hospital in Tiruchi for post mortem.

The Thuvakudi police are investigating.
title: Couple die in hit-and-run near Thuvakudi
